title: MANUFACTURE BY DRY PROCESSES OF ARTICLES, WITH OR WITHOUT ORGANIC BINDING AGENTS, MADE FROM PARTICLES OR FIBRES CONSISTING OF WOOD OR OTHER LIGNOCELLULOSIC OR LIKE ORGANIC MATERIAL  (containing cementitious material B28B; shaping of substances in a plastic state B29C; fibreboards made from fibrous suspensions D21J; drying F26B17/00)
Pretreatment of moulding material
informative_references: Manufacture of wood shavings, chips, powder or the likeFibrous raw materials or their mechanical treatment
special_rules: Pretreatments are actions performed before the manufacturing of the Pretreatment of moulding material refers for instance to actions for reducing formaldehyd emissions, actions for incresasing resistance to swelling by humidity and actions to mix the material with a binder.

title: {by spraying the agent on the falling material, e.g. with the material sliding along an inclined surface, using rotating elements or nozzles  (B27N1/0254 takes precedence)}
